snippet: Pope Francis on Saturday named a woman molested by a priest as a child to be part of a core group to help the Catholic Church fight the clerical sexual abuse of minors that has haunted it for over two decades...

headline.print_headline: Pope Appoints Former Child Victim to Church Group on Sex Abuse
headline.main: Pope Appoints Former Child Victim to Church Group on Sex Abuse

lead_paragraph: Pope Francis on Saturday named a woman molested by a priest as a child to be part of a core group to help the Catholic Church fight the clerical sexual abuse of minors that has haunted it for over two decades
